# ios_vlan (Resource)

Vlan resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ios_vlan" "example" {
  name = "test"
  id   = 1104
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (Number) The VLAN ID to configure. This is a required field and must be specified.
- `name` (String)
